rukus.text: A yimdanen! Eezzbet i Mass nnwen, zzenzla n yimir, stidep, d tadyant tabarart
Ass ideg ara p twalim, yal timoebbit a ppeppu win tessuiiuv, yal tadist a ppexseo. A pwaliv imdanen ssekoen, ur sskioen. Maca, aaaqeb n Oebbi iwaao
Ger yimdanen, illa win ipnamaren $ef Oebbi, war tamusni. Iteddu d yal cciian imcebbwel
Iura fellas: "ar wagi, win i t irran d bab is, ara t itlef, s tidep, u a t inheo ar uaaqeb ujajie

A yimdanen! Ma di ccekk ay tellam f tnekra, ihi, Nekwni, s tidep, Nxelq ikwen seg wakal, sinna, si tiqqit n l$ella, sinna, seg urgan, sinna, si tecriet, texleq ur texliq, iwakken ad awen Nbeggen. Neppara, di taabbuvin, ayen i Â£ ihwan, alamma d lajel ipwassnen. Sinna, Nessuffu$ ikwen id d llufanat, sinna a ppim$uoem. Segwen llan wid ippemmten, u segwen win ara iawven d awessur, ard ur ippisin acemma seg wayen issen. A pwalid akal d a$uoao. Ma Nesse$li d ageffur fellas, ad ikker, ad icuff, a d ifk tayuga n yal uuenf uziyn n le$ous
Ayagi, acku Oebbi d Tidep. D Neppa id Issidiren lmeggtin. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
U imir a d ias, war ccekk fellas. U Oebbi a d Issker wid illan di tneilin
Ger imdanen, illa win ipnamaren $ef Oebbi, war tamusni, ne$ nnhaya, ne$ Tazmamt ifeten
Icuff aqenduo, iwakken ad itlef seg ubrid n Oebbi. Fellas xezzu di ddunit. Deg wass n tnekra, a Nessuk fellas aaaqeb n tmeo$iwt
Ayagi, $ef wayen id urwen ifassen ik. U Oebbi ur Idennis imdanen
